title: Your best champ idea ever @riot youre welcome
body:
Think about a champ based on a Warlock from WoW. 
Loose idea for abilities:
Q - DoT
W - Slow maybe?
E -  Fear 
R - HP-channelling 

The fear **or**   HP-channel could be the ult I imagine, either one with minimal damage and a low cooldown. 
Passive could be a DoT reset on kills or assists or whatever you smart-alecks can think of.

It's simple, it's cool, it's clean - and potentially undead. Like a zombie. Wicked.
Do it, Riot. 

Comment to let me know your tweaks =)
